I love it My grand daughter love it and put some of her things in it thank youn💖💖💖💖

评论详情: love the color and elegant design. The outside material is good but the inner liner is too thin. One of the side pocket liners is already ripped after 2 months use.
This is cute to look at. That’s it. Gets dirty very easily.
It’s amazing, I use it every day, but after 2 weeks it had an oder of stinky cheese. It’s finally gone away though.
I bought my granddaughter a backpack to start school it was nice bc we just found them on Amazon so we beat having to gk to the store too they loved them and their shoes matched them perfectly.
My daughter loved the color and several pockets. Excellent product.

This backpack is exactly what I was looking for. It fits my laptop perfectly (its 15.6 inches), my notebooks for my classes, pencil case, calculator, etc. It holds a lot, and I've been extremely happy with this purchase. The straps are snug and very comfortable on the shoulders. I will say that the ribbon unties itself very quickly, but a tight double knot should hold it up. Otherwise, I definitely recommend it!
Great price for a great bag !
Bought this for my 9 yr old. It is well made and so adorable. The green is beautiful!
It ripped within the first month of use. The ribbon comes undone every day. The zippers get stuck everytime it's used.
i ordered the navy blue color, it has enough pockets and a lot of room inside to put whatever you want. i would recommend this.

So cute!! Love this product. My daughter was looking for a unique backpack to finish out her senior year of high school and carry with her to college next year and this delivered!! She was heartbroken when she got lipstick on it by accident 3 weeks into the school year so I bought it again and it was here by the next morning!! :)
Great quality and size perfect for traveling, school or work
Excelent material,very fashion it has a lot of bags my daughter loves purple and she loves the bows details everything can fit in there 🤗
This back pack is standerd size. Its made with ok materials. Not for the heavy loads that schools like yo give kids to carry around. Worth the buy
Fits a lot of stuff and has a lot of pockets. Looks very cute and holds up good so far(2 months).
My 12 year old loves it. The backpack is big enough and you can fit a small computer charger books and anything else you might need but not a lunch bag

The bag is lightweight but very sturdy. Her previous backpack felt heavy empty and was worse  with her notebook and water bottle inside. The bag also did well in the rain. I worried that it would soak thru when it rained last week. But nothing inside got wet ( and it was pouring). It’s only been about 3 weeks, but it still looks nice. Because of the material and light color, I thought it would be a stain magnet. Not the case at all.  #noregrets ( I’m laying in bed as I do this review or else I would have included a picture)
This backpack seems very well made and the material is soft and high quality.

i really like this backpack it’s so cute and it is very very spacious. lots of pockets for lots of stuff and really nice material! but.. i am worried about it holding up- i plan to use this as a backpack for my senior year of high school but i am a teeny bit worried about it ripping at the end of the straps- hopefully it lasts though!-  UPDATE: i’m more than half way into my senior year and this backpack has held up really really well i’m surprised 10/10 would recommend  FINAL UPDATE: this backpack held up a whole school year and could hold up another one it surpassed my expectations!
dudee it’s literally the prettiest back pack ive ever had, i can fit everything i need in it and im in high school
